Usage:

const Scale* table = SkUnPreMultiply::GetScaleTable();

for (...) { unsigned a = ... SkUnPreMultiply::Scale scale = table[a];

red = SkUnPreMultiply::ApplyScale(scale, red); ... now red is unpremultiplied }
